attributes.action: Increase contactless card payment limit to £100 during Covid Crisis
attributes.additional_details: It is a sensible and easily implemented solution to minimise risk
attributes.background: Increase contactless card payment limit to £100 during Covid Crisis with immediate effect to increase speed at checkout and interactions with others.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The contactless payment limit is set by banks.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
